name: Catarse (samelezeal)
description:
Catarse is a side scroller game in which the player collects garbage along a crowded street following one day of this character. While the player does it, they experience the negligence suffered by the garbage collector. People pass by the garbage collector and as they go, they mistreat the character.

To play, put on your uniform, collect the garbage and push you cart by holding the space button.
